scripts.test:unit: NODE_ENV=test bun test tests/unit/bsale tests/unit/alerts tests/unit/utils tests/unit/config.test.ts tests/unit/server.test.ts tests/unit/frontend tests/unit/scheduler tests/unit/sync tests/unit/api --preload ./tests/setup.ts && NODE_ENV=test bun test tests/unit/server/routing.test.ts
scripts.test:frontend: NODE_ENV=test bun test tests/unit/frontend/App.test.tsx tests/unit/frontend/AuthContext.test.tsx tests/unit/frontend/ErrorBoundary.test.tsx tests/unit/frontend/Header.test.tsx tests/unit/frontend/Login.test.tsx tests/unit/frontend/ProtectedRoute.test.tsx tests/unit/frontend/api-client.test.ts tests/unit/frontend/auth-components.test.ts tests/unit/frontend/components.test.ts --preload ./tests/setup.ts && NODE_ENV=test bun test tests/unit/frontend/component-ssr.test.tsx --preload ./tests/setup.ts
scripts.test:coverage: NODE_ENV=test bun test tests/unit/bsale tests/unit/alerts tests/unit/utils tests/unit/config.test.ts tests/unit/server.test.ts tests/unit/frontend tests/unit/scheduler tests/unit/sync tests/unit/api --coverage --preload ./tests/setup.ts && NODE_ENV=test bun test tests/unit/server/routing.test.ts --coverage
scripts.check: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run test
scripts.check:frontend: bun run typecheck && bun run verify:frontend
